pageContent: Top 50 Websites for Targeted Individuals Richard Lighthouse Top 50 Websites for Targeted Individuals Published by Richard Lighthouse on smashwords.com Creative Commons 4.0 License, 2019 by Richard Lighthouse. Please acknowledge source. ISBN: 9780463521816

www.smashwords.com/books/view/ 991544 RLighthouse.com Limit of Liability/Disclaimer of Warranty: While the author has used his best efforts in preparing this document, he makes no representations or warranties with respect to the accuracy or completeness of the contents and specifically disclaims any implied warranties or fitness for a particular purpose. 18 November 2019 - original Rev 2A 14 January 2020 Houston, Texas, U.S.A. TABLE OF CONTENTS Introduction Conclusions References Abstract This short ebook presents a summary of the top 50 websites, along with an update that includes 290 total websites. The algorithms of App.NeilPatel.com were used to track which web sites were ranked highest. There are certainly other ways to order this list, however, it still presents a good picture of which websites are being utilized by the T.I. Community. This chart will be updated each year, if possible, based on the best available information. Caution: Simply because a website is very active, does not mean that the information is accurate. It is suggested that each reader browses from many different sources, before deciding what is accurate. 1. TargetedJustice.com 2. StopGangstalkingCrimes.com 3. Mind-Control- News.de 4. TargetedIndividualsCanada.com 5. RLighthouse.com 6. Trance-Formation.com 7. JusticeForAllCitizens.com 8. Pactsntl.org 10. DataAsylum

1. Introduction The top internet sites are displayed for January 2020. This information captures most of the websites, however, there might be a few that were missed. If one was overlooked, this was not an intentional error.

Figure 8. 2. Conclusions Presented here, are the top 290 websites for Targeted Individuals. There are no claims that it is 100% accurate, although the author did use his best efforts. Readers are encouraged to read the associated technical papers at smashwords, lulu, amazon, barnesandnoble, kobo, and apple ibooks. This is a living document. The author reserves the right to make corrections and changes.

3. References 1. Richard Lighthouse, Smashwords.com 2. RLighthouse.com 3. TargetedJustice.com Acknowledgments Conflicts: The author experienced no conflicts of interest in writing this paper. About: The author holds a Master of Science (M.Sc.) degree in Mechanical Engineering from Stanford University.
